definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Then the eye is relaxed for distance and the entire amount of focusing ability is available to see close.
sentences.chinese: 远视的眼睛得以松弛，用全部调焦能力近看。

sentences.english: The refractive status showed hyperopic shift after cycloplegia .
sentences.chinese: 睫状肌麻痹后之屈光状态显示偏向远视。

sentences.english: People with a high degree of farsightedness along with astigmatism have less predictable results.
sentences.chinese: 对远视兼散光的人手术后结果的预期较少。

sentences.english: Conductive Keratoplasty (CK) can turn back the clock on farsightedness, but it cannot stop the clock.
sentences.chinese: CK虽可回拨远视的时钟，但它不能使这时钟停下来。

sentences.english: Therefore, long-term stability of hyperopic LASIK refractive corrections is uncertain.
sentences.chinese: LASIK治疗远视的长期稳定性尚不能确定。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the treatment and the result of children's farsighted amblyopia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童远视性弱视的临床治疗及疗效。

sentences.english: Farsightedness is caused when the cornea is too flat; or the eyeball is too short.
sentences.chinese: 远视，这引起角膜太扁平，或眼球的是太短了。

sentences.english: The hyperopia mirror's picture frame also has many fashion choices.
sentences.chinese: 远视镜的镜框也有许多时尚的选择。

sentences.english: Fish are usually nearsighted, although it is believed that sharks are farsighted.
sentences.chinese: 鱼通常是近视眼，虽然人们认为鲨鱼是有远视的。

sentences.english: FARSIGHTEDNESS is an asset whose value should not be underestimated.
We are all were, blurred our closest happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是远视眼，模糊了离我们最近的幸福。

sentences.english: Astigmatism can occur in addition to nearsightedness and farsightedness.
sentences.chinese: 散光可发生在除近视和远视。

sentences.english: Astigmatism frequently occurs with other vision conditions like nearsightedness (myopia) and farsightedness (hyperopia).
sentences.chinese: 散光和近视还有远视一样，都是常见的眼部疾病。

sentences.english: There were indications of "alcohol myopia" or "alcohol hyperopia".
sentences.chinese: 酒精干扰呈现认知“近视”与“远视”的迹象。

sentences.english: She's long-sighted and needs glasses to read.
sentences.chinese: 她是远视眼，看书要戴眼镜。

definition: ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
to diffuse light/see also 散光[san3 guang1]
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
